name: State defined
text: §431:1-213  State defined.  State means any state of the United States and the governments of Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, the United States Virgin Islands, and the District of Columbia. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 1997, c 233, §2; am L 2011, c 68, §2]
